definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Most importantly, this album has a stamp of Metallica written all over it.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，這張專輯的郵票金屬書面所有權。

sentences.english: The first section is conspectus of criminal written deposition.
sentences.chinese: 第一章爲刑事書面證言概論。

sentences.english: They will allocate funds to you if you requisition it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你提出書面申請，他們就會撥給你資金。

sentences.english: This leaves time in each task for the manual delivery of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 這爲每個任務留下了手工交付書面文檔的時間。

sentences.english: I further represent that I will notify GMI of any material changes in writing.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我保證將以書面形式通知GMI任何變動情況。

sentences.english: Use them respectfully in both oral and written communication.
sentences.chinese: 充滿敬意地在口頭和書面交流中使用它們。

sentences.english: Conversely, Protestants often interpret the Old Testament scriptures more literally than Catholics.
sentences.chinese: 相反，新教教徒往往用更爲書面的語言解釋聖經舊約。

sentences.english: Excellent written and spoken translation skills.
sentences.chinese: 優秀的書面及口語翻譯技巧。

sentences.english: Written expression is an important test content in English entrance examination questions.
sentences.chinese: 書面表達題是高考英語試題中的一項重要測試內容。

sentences.english: Punctuation marks are an integrant sign of cohesion and coherence in modern writing.
sentences.chinese: 標點符號是現代書面語中不可缺少的銜接和連貫標誌。

sentences.english: Our consular officers are required to give the reason in writing.
sentences.chinese: 我們的領事官必須書面說明拒籤原因。

sentences.english: In the meantime, I'll leave this info literature with you.
sentences.chinese: 那我現在就把這些書面資料留給你。

sentences.english: At Halim airport, Jakarta, Premier Wen delivered a written speech.
sentences.chinese: 在機場，溫家寶發表了書面講話。

sentences.english: Obert: If you can guarantee that on paper, I think we can discuss this further.
sentences.chinese: 假如你們能以書面保證，我想我們可以再談。

sentences.english: Was the music used in X-Ray Vision written and preformed by you?
sentences.chinese: 是雷視覺音樂的使用，你在X書面預製的？

sentences.english: English for science and technology treatises belongs into written language and has its own style.
sentences.chinese: 英語科技論文屬書面語體，其文體已自成一格。

definition: to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
